channel.title: Apple Events (video)
channel.itunes:author: Apple
channel.description: The Apple Events podcast is home to the latest keynote addresses. Watch announcements of new products and services and browse the archive of past events to relive revolutionary moments in the history of personal technology.

item.title: Introducing Apple Events (video)
item.itunes:author: Apple
item.description: The Apple Special Events podcast is home to the latest keynote addresses, hosted at the Steve Jobs Theater and other special venues. Watch announcements of new products and services and browse the archive of past events to relive revolutionary moments in the history of personal technology. Tap on the episode notes to find transcripts, translations, and more. Follow to be the first to receive new episodes from future events.
item.itunes:summary: The Apple Special Events podcast is home to the latest keynote addresses, hosted at the Steve Jobs Theater and other special venues. Watch announcements of new products and services and browse the archive of past events to relive revolutionary moments in the history of personal technology. Tap on the episode notes to find transcripts, translations, and more. Subscribe for free to be the first to receive new episodes from future events.
item.content:encoded: The Apple Special Events podcast is home to the latest keynote addresses, hosted at the Steve Jobs Theater and other special venues. Watch announcements of new products and services and browse the archive of past events to relive revolutionary moments in the history of personal technology. Tap on the episode notes to find transcripts, translations, and more. Subscribe for free to be the first to receive new episodes from future events.

item.title: Apple Event — October 30
item.itunes:author: Apple
item.description: Watch the special Apple Event to learn about the new MacBook Pro and iMac with the M3 family of chips.
